generate.get_generate_audio_error: Failed to get generated audio, please try regenerating
generate.hint_text_3: - Try to choose a tone that fits the character's expected personality.
generate.hint_text_4: - Use exclamation marks and other punctuation to guide the character on how to respond!
generate.hint_text_hover: Text to Audio Generation Guide (Click to show guide)
generate.send_generate_error: Failed to generate audio, please try regenerating
generate.textarea_placeholder: Enter what you want your character to say here...
generate.title: Generate

user_upload.hint_text_1: Upload/record audio files, and we will generate a matching video.
user_upload.hint_text_4: Longer audio will result in longer video generation times.
user_upload.hint_text_5: - The clearer the audio, the better the video effect.
user_upload.hint_text_6: To achieve the best results, minimize background noise and whispering.
user_upload.hint_text_7: - Use responsibly! When selecting audio, please comply with intellectual property, privacy protection, and copyright laws.

generation_tab.generate_audio_error: Audio upload failed, please check if the audio is normal and try regenerating
generation_tab.generate_error: Video generation failed, please try regenerating
generation_tab.generate_image_error: Image upload failed, please check if the image is valid and try regenerating

hedra_error.underage: Image safety check failed. The following content does not meet the guidelines: Involvement of minors. Please ensure your content complies with the guidelines.
hedra_error.celebrity: Image safety check failed. The following content does not meet the guidelines: Celebrity. Please ensure your content complies with the guidelines.

generation_tab.hint_text_2: The generation process is long, please do not close this page
generation_tab.no_source_error: Generation error, audio and portrait links not obtained

generate.generate_error_text: Portrait image generation failed, please try generating again
generate.prompt_error_text: Failed to process input content, please try changing the input content and generate here
generate.textarea_placeholder: Describe your character and click 'Generate' to create an image (e.g., Regal princess with a tiara.)
generate.title: Generate
generate.usage_text_1: Your image will be displayed here later

upload.generate_hint_2: Click the 'Generate' button directly to generate results based on reference examples. After entering your description, click the 'Generate' button again to get new results based on your prompt.
upload.generate_hint_5: - First describe the style (color photo, black and white charcoal drawing).
upload.generate_hint_6: - Describe the character (anime female, cyberpunk warrior, 90s sitcom character).
upload.generate_hint_7: - Describe the camera position (close-up, above the shoulders, facing the camera).
upload.generate_hint_8: - Describe the background (forest at night, quiet city).
upload.generate_hint_9: - Describe the lighting effect (cinematic, soft light, bright sun).
upload.hint_text_4: - Ensure the face is clearly visible.
upload.hint_text_5: - Make sure there is only one person in the image.
upload.hint_text_6: - Animals or objects may not produce the expected effect.
upload.title: Upload
upload.usage_text_1: Drag and drop images here, click to upload
